name: Incubus Express
description:
Introducing Incubus Express!
Incubus Express is a Third-Person Adult Fantasy Platformer being lovingly crafted by our team here at Studio Jigli. Made by adults for adults we aim to give a game experience that has narrative, love interests and platform fun.

Join Incuboi in growing his shop Incubus Express! Get pulled into the various plots happening around Blooming Oasis while you collect, gather, and craft gifts for your clients and friends. Tiamat your lovely Wyvern friend and assistant will help you in more ways than one.

Game Features
  • Fantasy Storyline
  • Full 3D Animated Sex Scenes
  • 3D Platforming and Related Mechanics
  • Dialogue System
  • Quest System
  • Outfits
  • Lover's Hub
  • Crafting & Gifts
